text: A kind of obvious question. Why isn't there a realtime connection between Facebook and Netflix or HBO or Apple TV or whatever. So that when I'm browsing movies I can see which of my friends loved it. I'm sure they must've had talks about this. it's so obvious. Or why didn't Facebook buy one of them? Wouldn't it be more of a sure thing than (drumroll please) The Metaverse. For that matter why isn't there a similar connection between Amazon and Facebook?
